dialogue: Actually, there is something you can help me with. I need to get the boss a coffee...
Pah! Coffee. Awful stuff. No, I have something far better.
Indubitably, good man! On one condition.
I must confess to a rather shameful predilection. Don't be a pill about it:
I rather consider myself a collector of women's undergarments.
Well, yes, but I was more thinking of...well, the unmentionables. A woman's pretties. Her knickers!
And if I get you Emma's panties, you'll give me something...better than coffee.
I'll see what I can do.
